Protocol.Label: LTPBR Protocol
Protocol.Citation: Weber N., Wheaton J.M., Shalcross A., Al-Chokhachy R, Bailey P., Bartelt K., Bennett S., Bouwes B., Bouwes N., Gilbert J., Dickard M., Heitke J., Jordan C., Glassic H., MacFarlane W.W., Miller S., Saunders C., Whitehead K. 2024. Low-Tech Process-Based Restoration Design and Monitoring Protocol: Standard Methods for Developing Project Designs and Assessing Riverscape Health. Version 2.0. Prepared by Anabranch Solutions and Utah State University Riverscapes Assessment and Monitoring Lab. Prepared for the Bureau of Land Management. Logan, UT. 81 pp. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.13769899
Protocol.Author: Nick Weber

Metric.Label: Dam Density
Metric.Description: The number of beaver dams per length of riverscape

Metric.Label: Number of Active Channels
Metric.Description: The total number of active channels (primary and non-primary) within the riverscape sample frame

Metric.Label: Floodplain Channel Head Count
Metric.Description: The number of channel heads in containing sample frame

Metric.Label: Floodplain Channel Head Density
Metric.Description: The number of channel heads per km of riverscape

Metric.Label: Channel Sinuosity
Metric.Description: The sinuosity of the primary channel in the riverscape sample frame

Metric.Label: Confluence Count
Metric.Description: The number of channel confluences in containing sample frame

Metric.Label: Confluence Density
Metric.Description: The number of channel confluences per km of riverscape

Metric.Label: Dam Count
Metric.Description: The number of dams in each sample frame

Metric.Label: Dam Count
Metric.Description: The number of dams in each sample frame

Metric.Label: Diffluence Count
Metric.Description: The number of channel diffluences in the containing sample frame

Metric.Label: Diffluence Density
Metric.Description: The number of channel diffluences per length of riverscape

Metric.Label: Channel Length
Metric.Description: The sum of all channel lengths in a sample frame

Metric.Label: Free Flowing Area
Metric.Description: The area of free flowing inundation in each sample frame

Metric.Label: Total Inundated Area
Metric.Description: The area of total inundation in each sample frame

Metric.Label: Proportion of Active Valley Bottom
Metric.Description: The proportion of the riverscape that is active

Metric.Label: Jam Area
Metric.Description: The area of jams in each sample frame

Metric.Label: Jam Count
Metric.Description: The number of jams in each sample frame

Metric.Label: Jam Density
Metric.Description: The number of jams per length of riverscape

Metric.Label: Jam Density
Metric.Description: The number of jams per length of riverscape

Metric.Label: Mid Channel Bar Area
Metric.Description: The area of of mid channel bars in containing sample frame

Metric.Label: Mid Channel Bar Count
Metric.Description: The number of mid channel bars in containing sample frame

Metric.Label: Mid Channel Bar Density
Metric.Description: The number of mid channel bars per km of riverscape

Metric.Label: Overflow Area
Metric.Description: The area of overflowing inundation in each sample frame

Metric.Label: Percent Free Flowing
Metric.Description: The percent of the inundation extents that is free flowing

Metric.Label: Percent Inundated
Metric.Description: The percent of the riverscape that is inundated at baseflow

Metric.Label: Percent Overflow
Metric.Description: The percent of the inundation extents that is overflow

Metric.Label: Percent Ponded
Metric.Description: The percent of the inundation extents that is backwater/ponded

Metric.Label: Percent Riparian Vegetation
Metric.Description: The percent of the riverscape that is riparian vegetation

Metric.Label: Proportion of Riverscape with Recovery Potential
Metric.Description: The percent of the riverscape that has recovery potential

Metric.Label: Pool Area
Metric.Description: The area of pools in containing sample frame

Metric.Label: Pool Count
Metric.Description: The number of pools in containing sample frame

Metric.Label: Pool Density
Metric.Description: The number of pools per length of riverscape

Metric.Label: Ponded Area
Metric.Description: The area of ponded inundation in each sample frame

Metric.Label: Primary Channel Length
Metric.Description: The length of the primary channel within the riverscape sample frame

Metric.Label: Relative Flow Length
Metric.Description: The sum of all channel lengths per length of riverscape

Metric.Label: Riffle Area
Metric.Description: The area of riffles in containing sample frame

Metric.Label: Riffle Count
Metric.Description: The number of riffles in containing sample frame

Metric.Label: Riffle Density
Metric.Description: The number of riffles per length of riverscape

Metric.Label: Riverscape Area
Metric.Description: The area of the riverscape valley bottom within the sample frame

Metric.Label: Riverscape Length
Metric.Description: The length of the riverscape centerline within the sample frame

Metric.Label: Secondary Channel Length
Metric.Description: Length of the secondary channels within the riverscape sample frame

Metric.Label: SEM Stage 0 Area
Metric.Description: The area of Stage 0 riverscape in each sample frame

Metric.Label: SEM Stage 1 Area
Metric.Description: The area of Stage 1 riverscape in each sample frame

Metric.Label: SEM Stage 2 Area
Metric.Description: The area of Stage 2 riverscape in each sample frame

Metric.Label: SEM Stage 3 Area
Metric.Description: The area of Stage 3 riverscape in each sample frame

Metric.Label: SEM Stage 4 Area
Metric.Description: The area of Stage 4 riverscape in each sample frame

Metric.Label: SEM Stage 5 Area
Metric.Description: The area of Stage 5 riverscape in each sample frame

Metric.Label: SEM Stage 6 Area
Metric.Description: The area of Stage 6 riverscape in each sample frame

Metric.Label: SEM Stage 7 Area
Metric.Description: The area of Stage 7 riverscape in each sample frame

Metric.Label: SEM Stage 8 Area
Metric.Description: The area of Stage 8 riverscape in each sample frame
